changeSet.author: LiruiMao
changeSet.sql:
create table fulfilment_request ( request_id bigint not null, tracking_guid uuid not null, payload json not null, order_id bigint default null, created_by varchar(64) not null, created_time timestamp not null, updated_by varchar(64) default null, updated_time timestamp default null,
primary key (request_id) );

changeSet.author: LiruiMao
changeSet.sql:
create table fulfilment_item ( fulfilment_id bigint not null, request_id bigint not null, payload json not null, created_by varchar(64) not null, created_time timestamp not null, updated_by varchar(64) default null, updated_time timestamp default null,
primary key (fulfilment_id) );

changeSet.author: LiruiMao
changeSet.sql:
create table fulfilment_action ( action_id bigint not null, fulfilment_id bigint not null, payload json not null, type int not null, status int not null, result json null, created_by varchar(64) not null, created_time timestamp not null, updated_by varchar(64) default null, updated_time timestamp default null,
primary key (action_id) );
